content.question: An economy is in long-run equilibrium. If the central bank reduces the growth rate of the money supply, which of the following must occur in the long run?

choices.label: The rate of inflation will decrease.
The long-run aggregate supply curve will shift to the left.
The production possibilities curve will shift to the left.
The long-run Phillips curve will shift to the left.

content.answer: The rate of inflation will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
